title: Phase 1: The Jibaro MVP - Basic Timer Implementation
description: Phase 1 MVP: Basic countdown timer with Puerto Rico flag colors, Play/Pause/Reset buttons with Spanglish labels, large digital display with circular progress, tab title updates, and Vercel deployment via GitHub Actions. Tech stack: Next.js 14+, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Zustand.

title: CI/CD Pipeline Setup
description:
## CI/CD Pipeline Setup

Configure GitHub Actions for quality gates and Vercel deployment.

### Acceptance Criteria:
- [ ] GitHub Actions workflow (ci-cd.yaml)
  - [ ] Trigger on push to main and PRs
  - [ ] Lint & Type Check job (ESLint + tsc --noEmit)
  - [ ] Build verification (npm run build)
  - [ ] Optional: Unit tests (Jest/Vitest)
- [ ] Vercel deployment job
  - [ ] Uses amondnet/vercel-action or Vercel CLI
  - [ ] Deploys only after quality-check passes
  - [ ] Production deploy on main branch only
- [ ] Environment variables configured
  - [ ] VERCEL_TOKEN
  - [ ] ORG_ID
  - [ ] PROJECT_ID

### Why GHA instead of Vercel native?
- Custom pre-flight checks
- Slack/Discord webhook notifications
- Cost control on build minutes

title: Phase 3: Polish & Sazón
description:
## Phase 3: Polish & Sazón

Add delightful animations and mobile optimization.

### Acceptance Criteria:
- [ ] Session completion animations (confetti / flag wave)
- [ ] Time increment chips (+1m, +5m) in main UI
- [ ] Responsive mobile design optimization
- [ ] PWA capabilities (offline support, installable)
- [ ] Theme toggle: Day Mode (Isla Verde) vs Night Mode (Noche de San Juan)
  - [ ] Day: Bright, sunny palette
  - [ ] Night: Dark blues, bioluminescent bay neon accents
- [ ] Background patterns (Taino symbols or palm leaves)

### Visual Polish:
- Subtle micro-interactions on button presses
- Smooth transitions between modes
- Loading states and error handling

title: Phase 2: Advanced Controls & Audio
description:
## Phase 2: Advanced Controls & Audio

Add smart controls and the signature Coquí audio experience.

### Acceptance Criteria:
- [ ] useTimer hook with Auto-Switch logic
  - [ ] Toggle for Auto-start Breaks (work ends → break starts)
  - [ ] Toggle for Auto-start Pomodoro (break ends → work starts)
- [ ] Coquí ambient sound player (El Yunque at night)
- [ ] Settings modal for custom durations
- [ ] Smart time selection chips (+1m, +5m, -5m)
- [ ] Slider control for Flow State adjustments (25m-50m)
- [ ] Independent volume sliders (Alarm + Ambient)

### Audio Assets Needed:
- Session Start: Guiro scrape or Dale!
- Session End: Coquí whistle or Cuatro chord
- Break End: ¡A
